location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Coll 1/40 'Aden. Changes in civil administration in the event of separation from India: government buildings; question of transfer to Imperial government'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in rough chronological order from the rear to the front of the file

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 9; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence between the Aden Chief Commissioner (Bernard Reilly), the India Office and the Colonial Office regarding the transfer of Government Buildings from the Government of India to the UK Government, following the transfer of the civil administration of Aden to the Colonial Office. It is agreed that the transfers should be made on the same lines as military buildings, i.e. free of charge.
